attributes.action: reassure the public about the safety of databases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Current media attention paid to the Inland Revenue shows how vulnerable new technologies can sometimes be. In light if this, the following report and the beta test pilot scheme on the Downing Street web page, the petitioner is calling on the UK govt. to examine confidentiality issues around personal data. Before another similar crisis evolves - can the P.M. please reassure the electorate that he is considering preventative measures to prevent the same kind of thing happening :
 
"Dr Roger Morgan, the children's rights director, found widespread concerns that sensitive information on the £224 million computer system could be vulnerable to security breaches. He urged ministers to keep security for the new ContactPoint database under constant review."

P.S. Have the discs been found yet - I may have an old one I can lend you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
